title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 17.5 - Number plates of the state, twy and official series
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 17.5 - Number plates of the state, twy and official series

State Regulations

Number plates of the State series which bear two numerals
designating the model year of the vehicle followed by four numerals issued for
vehicles owned by the State, number plates which bear the letters TWY followed
by numerals issued for vehicles owned by the New York State Thruway Authority, and number plates which bear five numerals followed by a letter issued for
vehicles owned by political subdivisions and public authorities of this State
shall be continued in use until otherwise prescribed by the commissioner. No
validating sticker will be required to be affixed to such
plates. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
17.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
